mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JCPD_QDHFB WHERE LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND szhh>=#{szhh} and #{ezhh}>szhh AND BMCODE=#{bmCode} AND BBID=#{bbid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JCPD_QDHFB WHERE LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND szhh>=#{szhh} and #{ezhh}>szhh AND BMCODE=#{bmCode} AND BBID=#{bbid}
SELECT * FROM JCPD_QDHFSHB WHERE BBID=#{bbid} AND BMCODE=#{bmCode} AND (SQZT=1 AND SHZT IN (0,1))

select t.column_value,avg(m.pci) as pci,avg(m.iri) as iri from table(fn_split(#{points},','))t join (select l.pci,l.iri,q.szhh from jcpd_lkpdmxb l left join jcpd_qmldb q on l.ldid=q.ldid where q.lxCode=#{lxCode} and l.bbid=#{bbid})m on t.column_value=m.szhh group by t.column_value order by t.column_value
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JCPD_QDHFB WHERE BBID=#{bbid}

SELECT QD.LXCODE,QD.SZHH,QD.EZHH,ROUND(QD.CD/1000,3) LENGTH,ROUND(AVG(MXB.PCI),2) PCI,ROUND(AVG(MXB.IRI),2) IRI FROM JCPD_QDHFB QD LEFT JOIN (SELECT MX.PCI,MX.IRI,QM.LXCODE,QM.SZHH,QM.EZHH FROM JCPD_LKPDMXB MX LEFT JOIN JCPD_QMLDB QM ON MX.LDID=QM.LDID WHERE MX.BBID=(SELECT QMBBID FROM JCPD_BBKZB WHERE BBID=#{bbid})) MXB ON QD.LXCODE=MXB.LXCODE AND MXB.SZHH>=QD.SZHH AND MXB.SZHH<QD.EZHH WHERE QD.LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND QD.SZHH>=#{szhh} AND QD.SZHH<#{ezhh} AND QD.BBID=#{bbid} GROUP BY QD.LXCODE,QD.SZHH,QD.EZHH,QD.CD

SELECT LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '龟裂' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)JL, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '块状裂缝' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)KL, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '纵向裂缝' THEN LJSJ WHEN '横向裂缝' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)DTLF, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '沉陷' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)CX, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '波浪拥包' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)BLYB, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '车辙' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)CZ, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '坑槽' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)KC, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '松散' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)SS, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '泛油' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)FY, SUM(CASE LXNAME WHEN '修补' THEN LJSJ ELSE 0 END)XB FROM (SELECT QD.LXCODE,QD.SZHH,QD.EZHH,LK.LXNAME,SUM(LK.LJSJ) LJSJ FROM JCPD_QDHFB QD LEFT JOIN (SELECT LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,LXNAME,SUM(LJSJ*DWKF*QZ)LJSJ FROM V_LKDC WHERE LXID LIKE '0101%' AND BBID=#{dcbbid} GROUP BY LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH,LXNAME) LK ON QD.LXCODE=LK.LXCODE AND QD.SZHH<=LK.SZHH AND QD.EZHH>LK.SZHH WHERE QD.BBID=#{bbid} AND QD.BMCODE=#{bmCode} AND QD.LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND QD.SZHH>=#{szhh} AND QD.EZHH<=#{ezhh} GROUP BY QD.LXCODE,QD.SZHH,QD.EZHH,LK.LXNAME) GROUP BY LXCODE,SZHH,EZHH ORDER BY LXCODE,SZHH
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JCPD_QDJD(ID,QDID,SZHH) SELECT SYS_GUID(),QD.QDID,TO_NUMBER(JD.COLUMN_VALUE) FROM JCPD_QDHFB QD,TABLE(FN_SPLIT(#{jd},'-')) JD WHERE QD.LXCODE=#{lxCode} AND QD.SZHH=#{szhh} AND QD.EZHH=#{ezhh} AND QD.BMCODE=#{bmCode} AND QD.BBID=#{bbid}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(SZHH,'-'),2)) DJ FROM (SELECT SZHH,ROWNUM RN FROM JCPD_QDJD WHERE QDID=#{qdid}) START WITH RN=1 CONNECT BY PRIOR RN=RN-1
